title: Bump acorn from 5.7.3 to 5.7.4

nodes.bodyText: Thank you for your submission! We really appreciate it. Like many open source projects, we ask that you sign our Contributor License Agreement before we can accept your contribution.You have signed the CLA already but the status is still pending? Let us recheck it.
Coverage remained the same at 39.175% when pulling c949c31 on dependabot/npm_and_yarn/acorn-5.7.4 into 107a534 on master.
